title: hextech crafting doesen't display what skin i have
body:
it's just not showing the skin it s just a blank space instead of the skin
https://gyazo.com/11e1d7230fb9d478f4f087e42547e580

replies.body:
Is this happening in both the Beta client **and** the Legacy Client? Try accessing your hextech inventory from the Legacy Client (from login) and let me know if this persists.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this happens on both clients.
